greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array read by rows: g(n,k) = 1 for n >= 0; g(n,k) = 0 if k > n; g(n,k) = g(n-1,k-1) + g(n-1,2k) for n > 0, k > 1.
link: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
xref: Cf. A274184 (row sums), A274192, A274199 (limiting reverse row), A274193, A274196.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jun 13 2016
